definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The entrance door revolves on a vertical central axis.
sentences.chinese: 入口大門圍繞着一個垂直中軸旋轉。

sentences.english: The area hosts the most influential urban axis in the Northwest part of China.
sentences.chinese: 該地區位於中國西北部最具有影響力的城市中軸線上。

sentences.english: The southern part of the axis has proved more difficult to beautify.
sentences.chinese: 中軸線的南邊部分則比較難美化。

sentences.english: Give me an old-fashioned tetragon on a central pivot every time.
sentences.chinese: 每次都給我看一個建在中軸上的四角大樓吧。

sentences.english: Chelsea's centre-halves will be haunted by the memory of confronting the Colombian.
sentences.chinese: 切爾西的中軸線遇到哥倫比亞人時堪稱噩夢。

sentences.english: The more spindles within the head, the more difficult it is to manage this problem.
sentences.chinese: 在貼裝頭中軸越多，該問題的處理難度就越大。

sentences.english: Piacentina stone covered wall confines the house all the way through the north-south axis;
sentences.chinese: 石牆通過南北中軸線始終定義着別墅的邊界。
您看，中間是一條中軸線。

sentences.english: The main buildings in the Temple of Heaven are constructed on a central north-south axis.
sentences.chinese: 天壇的主要建築物都是建在一箇中央南北中軸線上。

sentences.english: Linear quadtree medial axis transforms offer a compact and exact region representation.
sentences.chinese: 線性四元樹中軸變換是一種緊湊和精確的區域表示法。

sentences.english: Temple is the whole style of architecture, showing the layout symmetry axis on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 現全寺建築的風格，呈中軸線兩邊對稱佈局。

sentences.english: At last, the author brings forward some suggestions about Beijing's axle wire design.
sentences.chinese: 並對北京中軸線的城市規劃提出了一些建議。

sentences.english: Ovules attached to the central axis of an ovary with two or more locules.
sentences.chinese: 胚珠着生在二室或多室子房的中軸上。

sentences.english: The layout of the sunken landscape spreads out along the central axis, forming the pillar of the underground commercial plaza.
sentences.chinese: 下沉景觀廣場沿中軸線佈局，構成地下商業城的脊柱。

sentences.english: Along the axis of three-hall building.
The carpel closed toward and connected with the ovary central column to form axile placentation since mid October.
sentences.chinese: 十月中旬起心皮向內合生並與中軸連合形成中軸胎座。

definition: variant of 漁網|渔网[yu2 wang3]
